question: Which state has launched Amma Youth Sports Scheme?
explanation:
The high-level committee on industrial guidance and single window system, chaired by the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu, Edappadi K Palaniswamy recently approved investment proposals worth Rs 6608 Crores. The fifteen new investments are expected to boost the employment generation in the state.
During the event, the Chief Minister also launched a scheme named ‘Amma Youth Sports Scheme’ to encourage the sporting activities of youth in the state. Amma Youth Sports Committee would be formed under the scheme, which is to be implemented in all gram panchayats and Panchayat unions.
